title: Senate House a ‘Sparkling Hub’ for the Bloomsbury Festival (University of London)
text: ( Source : University of London ) The University of London is delighted to be a key partner in this year's Bloomsbury Festival (22-25 October). After taking a year off in 2013 the Bloomsbury Festival returns this year for four days of
